About.title: xs.tools
About.description: We offer a series of practical tools to help you effortlessly solve various daily problems.

ConvertCaseText.title: Convert Case Text
ConvertCaseText.description: Easily Change Text Case for Better Readability and Consistency

ExtractPalettleFromImage.title: Extract Palettle From Image
ExtractPalettleFromImage.description: Effortlessly Generate Color Palettes for Your Designs.
ExtractPalettleFromImage.drag-file-s-here-or-click-to-browse: Drag file(s) here or click to browse
ExtractPalettleFromImage.tips: Click the color values to quickly copy to the clipboard

AiSlugGenerator.title: AI url-slug Generator
AiSlugGenerator.description: Automatically Create SEO-Friendly url-slug for Your Content.
AiSlugGenerator.placeholder:
Enter the content that requires url-slug.

CheckWebcam.title: Check Webcam
CheckWebcam.description: Instantly Test and Verify Your Webcam’s Functionality
CheckWebcam.tips: It looks like your browser is blocking access to webcam identifiers. Because of this, it’s impossible to detect and manage all available webcams.
CheckWebcam.tips-btn: Click here to allow access to webcam identifiers

LengthUnitConverter.title: Length Unit Converter
LengthUnitConverter.description: Quickly Convert Between Different Units of Length

WeightUnitConverter.title: Weight unit converter
WeightUnitConverter.description: Easily Convert Between Various Units of Weight
